::Zardus/Perndabot/Reptilica/Bloodystrike::

Zardus growls as Tavatron's sword slashes across his chest, jumping back and 
letting Iron Raptor's slash miss him.

"Big mistake," he says, transferring his rifle to his left hand and pulling 
out his plasma launcher with his right. He lowers both guns at Iron Raptor, 
firing with each.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Perndabot roars, seeing the two maximals attack his leader. The huge bot 
pulls out both his rifles, firing one at Tavatron and one at Iron Raptor.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Reptilica and Bloodystrike circle around the maximals, Reptilica firing at 
Tavatron and Bloodystrike at Iron Raptor.
